ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks, I ll check it out and post what I find Xill
ygData.messageBody:
thanks, I'll check it out and post what I find

Xill



>From: "Rivers, David" <riversd@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 81
>Date: Thu, 7 Oct 1999 08:42:57 -0400
>
>Pestilance Scythe used to be called to Opal Scythe, It what Lord Grimrot
>drops if he is killed. He can be found in South Karana.
>Opal Scythe used to cast lame ass disease cloud - No one used to even try
>for it.. So verant revamped it to make it a little more desireable... And
>The process of it being revamped, it got a new name.
>Pestilance Scythe (Not sure of stats or spell just check
>www.gameznet.com/eq)
>
> > ----------
> > From: Xillith ofNeriak[SMTP:xillith@...]
> > Reply To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com

> > Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 81

> >
> > I have no idea what a Pestilance Scithe even is. Please tell us what
>you
> > know. I am interested, as I am sure many others are too.
> >
> > Xillith
> >
> >

> > >
> > >Hey, would it be a huge hassle if you could give the ring of the dead
> > steps
> > >again?
> > >And who to ask about it, I'm anxious also to get this...
> > >Also, does anyone know how I could recharge the Pestilence Scythe from
> > Lord
> > >Grimrot
> > >in south karana? it used to be called the opal scythe, but changed with
> > >last
> > >patch.. I can only guess that he would recharge it, but I'm afraid to
> > >try... not
> > >sure about how to recharge things at all. Strangely, this scythe can be
> > >used by
> > >necromancers. Imagine a necro with 2 hand slash... yeah.
> > >
> > >Envy
> > >Tunare server
> > >
